modShortDescription: With this 7 Days to Die mod, you never need to reload, nor do you need to worry about weapons and tools breaking… ever. Updated for Alpha 18.
modDescription:
With this 7 Days to Die mod, you never need to reload, nor do you need to worry about [weapons](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/) and [tools](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-tools/) breaking… ever. Updated for Alpha 18.

**[Download](http://cdgroup.org/files/7dtd/InfiniteAmmoandDurability.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/8777-lucs-modlet-collection-quality-bonuses-better-stamina-terrain-mv-spd-etc/).

**Credits:** [Luc](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/luc/)
